name: E-Mail Signature Generator
description:
Stand out with these beautiful signature templates for your e-mails. Simply add your personal information via a form and instantly update the signature templates. Export your favorites as a PNG image and paste them directly into your e-mail composer. Suitable for both professional and personal use.


What's in the box?


  1. Set of 18 high resolution signature cards.
  2. Available in both solid and gradient colored backgrounds.
  3. Multiple color palette options.
  4. Sample preview as a use case.


-

Jello (@madewithjello)
